p: Inforiver Analytics+ is the fastest way to visualize your data and share insightful stories in Microsoft Power BI as a Power BI Certified Visual. Analytics+ also enables large enterprises to migrate from Tableau, Spotfire, Qlik, Domo, Cognos, SAP Lumira, or their static PowerPoint dashboards from Think-cell or Mekko Graphics and consolidate them within Microsoft Power BI.
The intuitive, no-code user experience (UX) helps even casual users build dashboards and storyboards in minutes, with 100+ charts, cards, and tables integrated into a single visual.

Inforiver Analytics+ is your one-stop visual with the best performance among all custom visuals. It can render 10x more data points compared to native Power BI (30K data points Vs 1K - 3.5K data points).
Inforiver Analytics+ is certified by IBCS and offers the most number of IBCS-certified templates, better performance, and flexibility over any other IBCS-certified software in the market.

100+ advanced visualization options, including some of the most sought-after and advanced visualizations on Power BI, like:

Marimekko chart (variable width column or cascade chart) - stacking and 100% scales
Radar/Polar/Spider chart
Box Plot and whisker plot with support for dynamic and pre-calculated quartiles
12+ variations of bullet and integrated variance charts and more
Advanced combination and dual-axes charts
Hierarchical treemap, sunburst chart
Slope graph
Arrow chart, dumbbell chart, dot plot, range plot
Pie chart, Donut chart, Variable pie chart
Scatter chart, Quadrant chart, Bubble chart
Storytelling features like Think-cell and Mekko Graphics
Dynamic Dynamic deviation (total and by level) and CAGR
Annotations
Series connector lines
Automatic series and categorical sorting
Structure Pivot data for your hierarchical data on all three axes (x,y,z) like Spotfire
